mapper.sql: id, name, type, url, parent_id, parent_ids, permission, available
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_resource (name, type, url, parent_id, parent_ids, permission, available) VALUES ( #{name}, #{type}, #{url}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{permission}, #{available} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_resource SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, url = #{url}, parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, permission = #{permission}, available = #{available} WHERE id = #{id}
